level.heading: Exclusiveness of remedy.
level.text: Nothing in this chapter shall be construed to prevent the tenant of such apartment house from pursuing any other action or remedy at law or equity that it may have against the owner, agent, lessor, manager or company.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-94
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-94, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 42-3301.
